p: SARS-CoV-2 is the third re-emergence of a coronavirus in the past two decades and has abruptly put a halt to most social and economic activity around the world, the consequences of which are immeasurable. 122 This pandemic will undoubtedly change our daily habits and social routines and should serve as a huge wake-up call that has shown the vulnerability of the human race. For now, the global battle against COVID-19 continues, and together, we will inevitably defeat the coronavirus. Hard lessons will be learned that will better prepare us for the next pandemic.
